pages.text: Fire spells can be found in Nether Fortresses and Bastions

pages.title: Incombustible
pages.text: Grants fire resistance for 1 minute  $(li)Mana Cost: 50

pages.title: Scorch
pages.text: Sets the target on fire for 10 seconds $(li)Mana Cost: 30 $(li)Range: 5

pages.title: Hellbeam
pages.text: Fires a quick beam of heat that deals damage to targets $(li)Mana Cost: 10
